unnormalised: Obstetrics ani Gynecology-chea adbhoot, vichitr sonvsarantlean cholop!
normalised: Obstetrics ani Gynecology hachea adbhut, vichitr sonvsarantlean cholop!

unnormalised: Tech, tumi expectant asat, hanv? Congrats! Bhavnam, 3 AM-ak *aloo paratha* khaucheo itrsa ani appointments-anchea ek vodllea vortulanchea khatir toyar ravat, oh, appointments! Tumchea favorite chai stall-antlean tumi tumchea OB-GYN-achea office-an odik vell karcharat. Ani mhojem aikun ghe, tumi tumchea doctor-acher ek khas sobondh viksit kortole... zo tumchea avoi-kodden odik muktponnan shereirak kriaancher bhasabhas korunk zata. Punn tem poilem ultrasound ugddas asa? Screen-acher tem dhunvor bhonvon Rs. 2500-ak poddlem ani eka dham, tumi tachi bori dekhbhall korunk obshed zaleat. Borem vell!
normalised: Tech, tumi expect kortat, ho? Congrats! Emotion-anchem vadel, tin voram vellar *aloo paratha* khavpachi ievp ani appointments-ak toyar ravat, oh, appointments! Tumchea O-B-G-Y-N-achea office-ant tumi tumchea favourite chai stall-antlean odhik vell karch kortole. Ani mhaka visvas divp, tumi tumchea doctor-achea sangata ek khas sambandh viksit kortole... tumchea avoi-chea poros odhik svatantranen tumi bodil-achea karya-cher bhasabhas kortole. To poilo ultrasound ugddas asa? Screen-acher asli mhaka dista tem rupayan don hazar panch she rupayan ailem ani achkan, tumi tachi bori asa mhonn chintunk lagle. Bori vella!

unnormalised: Appointments-anchea vixoyan bhasabhas korunk zalear, "gestational age"-chea khellak toyar ravat. Tumi "Tumi 12 wks-anchear asat," oxem aikunk zata, ani eka dham, tumi school-ak portun asat, kaim kompliketed maths equation nirney korunk proyotn kortat. Ani Glucose Tolerance Test-icher hanv survat korunakai. Tem sickle sweet concoction piyen duka dukanani tumi Diwali-chea vellak khauleo *gulab jamuns*-ankhanchi shiksha zashi dista. Mhaka suchovn? Tumi ‘Fear Factor’-antle contestant zashi dista ani tem soktichem piyunk dhakltat! Dr. Sharma sodanch sangtat, "Tem fakat bhurgeachea khatir asa, beta!"
normalised: Appointments-anchi bhasabhas kortalem, “gestational age” game-ak toyar ravat. Tumi “Tumi bara weeks poros poilem aileat” mhonn aikotole, ani achkan tumi school-ak portun yetat, thodde kathin maths equation-ak decode korpak prayatn kortat. Ani Glucose Tolerance Test-acher mhaka suru korpak divonakat. Tea bolly-sweet concoction-ak pieup Diwali-achea vellar khaili tea *gulab jamun* -am khatir ek shiksha dishta. Mhojem suchovn? Tumi ‘Fear Factor’-ant ek contestant mhonn pretend korat ani tem down chug korat! Doctor Sharma sogleank sangta, “Tech fakt baby khatir, beta!”

unnormalised: Ani todi fun abbreviations asa. HCG, AFP, NIPT... tem ek noveen bhas shikun zashi dista. Tumi them 2 AM-ak Google kortole, kaim dukh zalolem asa mhunn dharun, fokot tem soglle bare asa mhunn sodun kaddunk. Ani ten vajan vaddpaak visar nakat. Eka dham, tem kilos teganak zavunk lagta mhunn vichar korunk zata punn tumi ten sodtale na. Punn tech, tumi ek munis vaddoytat! Extra butter chicken-ak tumchea-yakhi reward divat, tumi tem kartut zatat! Kaim dukani portion-an zaka.
normalised: Magir mazache abbreviation asat. H-C-G, A-F-P, N-I-P-T... tem ek novi bhas shiktalelea bhaxen asta. Tumi tanchea vixoyant don voram vellar Google-ar sodtole, kainch bhaynkar chuk zalea mhonn khatri asta, poileantleank te soglem purnopanen normal asta mhonn sodun kaddpak. Ani weight gain visronakat. Achkan, te kilos tumchea khasgi zagear zollpitat tumi khontun korunk nasleo. Punn hey, tumi ek monis vaddaitat! Adhik butter chicken sangatan tumchi mahima karat, tumi tem zai. Maybe don portions asunktu.

unnormalised: The crowning glory? The delivery apunnach! Konnakodden tem "normal" delivery vor C-section (16/05/2024-chea khatir schedule kelem, asankay?), tem ek anubhav asa tumi kednach visar na. Fokot tumchen sobhogo-chen anubhav pack korunk ugddas dhorat, ek bore pustak (karonn labor-ak vell lagunk sakta!), ani asankay tumchea favorite Bollywood star-achem photograph divunchil mhunn tumchi prerena rakhunk. Ani magnnem korunk je hospital-ache Wi-Fi karkach kortach, karonn tumi tean little bundle of joy Instagram korunk sodtat!
normalised: The crowning glory? Delivery tech! Tem ek “normal” delivery vo ek C-section (solavya Mai don hazar ani tevisakhatir schedule kelea, talvez?), tech ek anubhav tumi kednach visorunk na. Fokot tumchea vinodi bhavna-ank pack korpak ugddas dovrat, ek borem pustok (karon labor-ak ek vell lavuk sakta!), ani tumchea favourite Bollywood star-achem ek picture tumaka motivate korpak. Ani hospital Wi-Fi kam korun asta mhonn prarthana korat, karon tumi Instagram-ar tea little bundle of joy A-S-A-P korpak zanvai!

unnormalised: Tech, buckle up, buttercup! Hem yatran vostu vattpachem ek vostu zalolem vortul zatelem, vostum-utpatti, nimnanti, ani mhosrtachi vell zaloli. Fokot tem cholop dharun ani tumche vicharachear vishwas korunk ugddas dhorat. Ani sogllem chuk zalam vor, tem hormones-ancher bhoktem! Tumchea-iakhi ek noveen jivat zallelem asa tean karkach kortelem: hem crazy, adbhoot sonvsarant ek noveen jivat divunchi. Atam tumchea-iakhi tem *aloo paratha* gheunk zata!
normalised: Tech, buckle up, buttercup! Hi yatra ek vild ride zanvk voitat, uchar-ninch bharlea, unchayim, nimne ani kshanam tumi sogleamk samballtok. Fokot magachea vattent haspak ugddas dovrat ani tumchea instincts-acher visvas dovrat. Ani soglem fail zatalear, tem hormones-ancher blame korat! Te soglem zalea uprant, tumi ek ud’yog korpak voitat: tea krazy, adbhut sonvsarant ek novem jivit hadop. Ata vo ani tea *aloo paratha*-ak mellou!
